insufficientLivesDesc: You need at least 1 energy to start this test. You can earn energy from the Chest tab.
noConnectionDesc: It looks like you're not connected to the internet. Please check your connection and try again.

auth.title: Too Many Attempts
auth.message: You've made too many login attempts. Please wait a few minutes.

game.title: Action Failed
game.message: Too fast! Please wait a few seconds.

session.title: Session Error
session.message: Invalid session. Please restart the test.

database.duplicate: This information is already in use.
database.connection: Connection issue. Please check your internet.
database.validation: Invalid input. Please check and try again.
database.general: Action couldn't be completed. Please try again.
database.notFound: The requested record was not found.
database.timeout: The operation took too long. Please try again.

generic.title: Unexpected Error
generic.message: Something went wrong. Don't worry, your data is safe.

network.title: Connection Error
network.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.message: The server took too long to respond. Please try again in a few moments.

audio.title: Audio Failed to Load
audio.message: There was an error loading the audio file. Make sure your device volume is on.

data.title: Failed to Load Content
data.message: There was a problem loading the content. Try refreshing the page.

auth.title: Session Error
auth.message: Your session may have expired. Please log in again.

permission.title: Permission Required
permission.message: Please grant the necessary permissions to use this feature.

storage.title: Storage Error
storage.message: Your device may be running low on storage. Try freeing up some space.

game.title: Game Failed to Load
game.message: An error occurred while starting the game. You can return to home and try again.

lesson.title: Lesson Failed to Load
lesson.message: There was a problem loading the lesson content.

chat.title: Chat Unavailable
chat.message: The AI assistant is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

settings.title: Settings Error
settings.message: An error occurred while loading settings.

premium.title: Purchase Error
premium.message: The payment could not be completed. You have not been charged.
